title: Surprise Episode: Marc's QB Index Haikus
itunes:title: Surprise Episode: Marc's QB Index Haikus
description:
Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you a surprise bonus episode of the Around the NFL Podcast checking in on Marc's latest QB Index, where he wrote a haiku for every starting quarterback. Marc and Gregg talk through the rankings and Marc gives dramatic readings of his best haikus.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
